title: Immaculate Duplex with Private Garden in Historic Rynek
description: This stylishly renovated duplex offers 3 well-proportioned bedrooms and 2 modern bathrooms over a generous 126 sqm floor plan. The home boasts a contemporary open-concept interior, carefully crafted to high standards, making perfect use of light and available space. The private garden is ideal for entertaining or enjoying quiet family moments, while a dedicated laundry room enhances daily convenience. The duplex is located on a peaceful, historic street, maintaining the charm of classic Kazimierz Dolny with modern comforts.
neighborhood_description: Situated in the heart of Kazimierz Dolny's Rynek, this property offers a peaceful, family-friendly aspect yet is conveniently proximate to the town’s business and heritage districts. Enjoy quaint cafes, artisanal shops, and local markets just a short walk away, all in a neighborhood renowned for its cultural charm and relaxed pace. Quick highway access makes commuting to larger cities or weekend escapes from the city a breeze.
lifestyle_benefits: ideal for family living or lucrative rental
serene historic location with investing appeal
target_buyer: Savvy property investors or young professional families seeking a blend of investment potential and lifestyle in one of Poland’s most scenic locations.
market_positioning: This property stands out as a recently refreshed, turnkey investment in Kazimierz Dolny, straddling lifestyle appeal and profitable rentals typically found in vibrant tourist destinations with commuter access.
